content: The Advanced Concepts Team at the European Space Agency has opened a research fellowship position to work on evolutionary methods and mission design. You can find more details here: https://career2.successfactors.eu/career?career%5fns=job%5flisting&company=esa&navBarLevel=JOB%5fSEARCH&rcm%5fsite%5flocale=en%5fGB&career_job_req_id=8710&selected_lang=en_GB&jobAlertController_jobAlertId=&jobAlertController_jobAlertName=&_s.crb=tdZKHdnyToTfiXStqtL9oN86BOU%3d
